Articles.Content: So I’m wondering how hard KSP 2 will be to run. I have a GTX 1650 Mobile (4GB) and an i5 9300h, as well as 8gb of RAM. I’m able to run AVP with 4k textures. I can run TUFX with the AVP preset at around 40-50 fps, so I am pretty sure I will be able to run KSP 2, but I just wanted confirmation.
